message: Let's be fair and avoid too many rounds, Bob. I propose a 60/40 split.
Your split was a bit unfair to me. I'm proposing a more balanced 55/45 split in my favor. This considers that the money will be worth less with each round, impacting you more than me.
Bob, it's clear we both want to maximize our gains. Let's be practical and split this 50/50 before inflation eats further into our potential earnings.
